title: Sacred 3
notes: Tested 15 minutes of gameplay with no apparent issues (aside from the game being pants).

title: Sacred 3
notes:
Gamepad (steam controller tested) cannot be used as either primary or guest, will cause crash.
Sound is very choppy.
The taskbar appears as an opaque bar over the bottom until resolution changes in settings -every launch-.
Using keyboard and mouse, everything else appears stable and functional.
